name: BIRDROCK HOME Pizza Stone for Oven and Grill | 16" Cordierite Baking Stone for Cooking, Bread, Pie, BBQ | Indoor - Outdoor | Grill, Smoker, Toaster Use | Ceramic Sheet for Crispy Crust (Round)
short_description: VERSATILE COOKING TOOL: The BIRDROCK HOME Pizza Stone for Oven and Grill is perfect for grilling, baking, and cooking various dishes. Ideal for making crispy pizzas, bread, pies, and other baked goods, both indoors and outdoors. PREMIUM CORDIERITE: Crafted from durable cordierite, this baking stone can withstand high temperatures up to 1450°F. It's designed to handle the intense heat of your oven, grill, or smoker, ensuring perfect, even cooking every time. High Heat Resistant - Made from quality cordierite stone, it withstands temperatures up to 1450°F, ensuring even cooking and perfect crusts. Ideal for those who love a well-baked crust, it's perfect for achieving that professional pizzeria texture. MULTIFUNCTIONAL USE: This versatile pizza stone is not just for pizzas. Use it for grilling meats, baking cookies, or even as a bread pan. It's a great addition to any chef's bakeware collection, expanding your culinary possibilities in the kitchen or outdoors. DIMENSIONS & CARE: This ceramic baking stone is the perfect size for most ovens and grills. For best results, hand wash only; avoid using soap or chemicals to maintain its integrity and performance. Cleaning Care - Only hand wash the pizza stone; do not use soap or chemicals

name: 12 Inch Black Non-stick Ceramic Pizza Stone Pan, Round Oven Baking and Cooking Stone for Ovens & Grill & BBQ
short_description: Include: 12" black pizza stone x1(12"x12"x0.35") Natural materials: The pizza stone made of 100% natural Cordierite stone and coated in a protective glaze,which is no smell and excellent themal shock resistance, Great Stone: Unique design the two sides stone.The black side can easy to clean and the light yellow can bake the pizza more drier.You can choose the side to bake your pizza.Heat safe up to 1472℉(800℃).Great for cooking fresh or frozen pizza on the grill or in the oven. Perfect for baking pizza, bread, cookies and more at home with family and friends. Easy Clean: Our stone have two sides.The black side is coated in a non-stick glaze that prevents crust from fusing to it and creating a mess.So we can clean the stone more easily only with warm water. Warning: Please wash the stone until completely cooled off, and not wash it with sopy water or detergent.Also need to use the stone correctly, first placed in a room-temperature oven and then preheated, otherwise placing the cold stone in a hot oven could cause it to crack

name: Unicook 16 Inch Round Pizza Stone, Heavy Duty Cordierite Bread Baking Stone for Oven and Grill, Thermal Shock Resistant, Ideal for Baking Crisp Crust Pizza, Bread and More, Includes Scraper
short_description: Durable Construction: Unicook pizza stone is made of all natural Cordierite, sintered in 2100°F kiln for hours, no odor under proper use. Feature of superior strength, durability, heat retention and excellent thermal shock resistance, built to outlast all others. Heat resistant up to 1,450°F (787°C) Secret of Super Crisp Crust Pizza: Full of invisible micro-pores which draw out moisture from dough, distribute heat evenly for optimal cooking, make pizza or flatbread with crispy crusts, avoiding the sogginess that often occurs with metal pans Multi-functional Pizza Stone: 16 inch round pizza stone has golden thickness 0.6"(15mm), weight up to 7.5 lbs. Unicook bread stone distributes heat evenly for optimal cooking, which is great for cooking fresh or frozen pizza on the grill or in the oven. Perfect for baking pizza, bread and cookies at home Plastic Scraper: A multi-purpose plastic scraper is a bonus which can be used as a dough cutter or scrape off the residue stuck to the stone(use on cool stone surface only) WARNING: Never use soap or detergent to clean the stone! Never season Cordierite bread stone with oil or grease! (WARM TIP: If your pizza stone arrives damaged or you need any assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us)

name: HANS GRILL PIZZA STONE | Circular Pizza Stone For Oven Baking & BBQ Grilling With Free Wooden Peel | Extra Large Round 15" Inches Diameter (38CM) Durable Cordierite Cooking Stone.
short_description: PIZZA STONE FOR GRILL AND OVEN: Our very best pizza stone formulated from toughened porous cordierite stone. FDA safe and heat resistant up to 1112°f(600℃). BAKING STONE: Multiple use set for baking Italian style pizza, pies, pastry, frozen pizza, calzone and artisan bread. INDOOR OR OUTDOOR: The perfect stone pizza pan for oven and BBQ use. Dine al fresco under the stars or stay warm and cozy inside. OPTIMAL COOKING: The Pizza Oven cheat code, a more economical way to cook Pizza from the base up, distribute heat evenly for the perfect finish. WE ARE PIZZA PEOPLE: Staining is a very normal part of the pizza making process. Marks and stains will not affect the performance or function of the stone. Many cooks even prefer a stone that has been well used!

name: homEdge Pizza Stone Set, Heavy Duty Round Cordierite Baking Stone for Bread, Pizza, Thermal Shock Resistant Cooking Stone with Bamboo Pizza Peel Paddle for Oven and Grill-12 Inches (Diameter)
short_description: The pizza stone is great for baking fresh and frozen pizzas. The set is also a solution for baking cookies, bread and other baking at home. The set is inclusive of pizza stone and a bamboo pizza peeling board. Made of safe material and the set is odorless. The stone for baking / grilling is with excellent thermal shock resistance. It can be heat up to 1472°F (800°C). It make it heat evenly. Way to clean: Scrape off any excess food with a spatula after the stone is cooled. Use a brush to scrub the stone under warm water. DOT NOT use detergent or soap on the stone which will leave a soapy odor residual. 12” pizza stone dimension: 12” / 30.5 cm (diameter) x 1.2 cm / 0.47 in (thickness). The pizza peeler: 15.5” / 39 cm x 11” / 28 cm x 0.4” / 1 cm. Package included: 12” pizza stone x 1 pc; bamboo peal board x 1 pc; Instruction x 1 pc

name: Old Stone Round Pizza Stone, 16-Inch
short_description: Makes restaurant quality pizzas, bread, pastries and vegetables Durable, non-cracking; crafted from a blend of lead-free clays Absorbs oven heat and transfers it evenly.Do not clean the stone with soap Recommended for up to 500 degrees in a standard home oven
product_description: Pizza Night is a weekly festivity in your household, and it doesn’t take place without this 16” Round Pizza Stone. The stone is made to evenly distribute heat and provide a soggy-free center, helping to procure the pepperoni pie of their dreams. It’s also got ridges on the bottom that make it easy to pick up and set down. The best part? The baking stone’s symmetry keeps your pizza toppings tidy and in line, which is more than you can say for your rowdy Pizza Night crowd. And don’t stop with just the za. This stone can be used to evenly cook bread, pastries and even vegetables.

name: Large Pizza Stone for Oven 16 inch - Round Pizza Stone for Grill with Handles, Wood Pizza Peel and Cutter Set - Baking Stone for Bread - Pizza Making Kit Accessories - Gifts for Food Lovers
short_description: MAKE THE BEST PIZZA AT HOME: Elevate your pizza game with our pizza stone set. Transform your oven or BBQ into a pizza oven and create crispy crust pizzas at home just like your favourite pizzeria. IDEAL SIZE FOR OVENS, GRILLS & SMOKERS: Our 16 inch pizza grilling stone, or pizza stone for smoker, are designed for maximum surface area for your cooking needs. We offer the set with oven pizza stone, handles, pizza peel and cutter or just the 40.65 cm round stone with handles. WON'T BREAK IN HIGH HEAT: Our cordierite pizza stones are designed for high temperatures up to 1500°F(815°C). Simply preheat the heavy duty cooking stone with oven or grill and it will last a lifetime. This durable construction makes it the perfect pizza stones for oven, or grill pizza stone for outdoor grill. NON-STICK BAKING: Say goodbye to burnt bottoms and uneven cooking. Whether you're making homemade pizzas or heating up frozen ones, our pizza pan for oven ensures even heat distribution for perfectly cooked pizzas every time. Plus, cleaning up is a breeze with our easy-to-follow instructions. EASY TO USE & VERSATILE: Beyond just pizza, our outdoor pizza oven stone offers endless possibilities. Use it as nonstick sourdough bread baking stone, biscuits, cookies, veggies, and more. Can use as a stone cookie sheet, bread stone, grill stone and more. SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: If for any reason our pizza set doesn't meet your expectations, contact us! You'll be answered by a human within 24 hours for support. COMPLETE 5-PIECE PIZZA MAKING SET: Includes everything you need - durable pizza stone with removable stainless steel handles, wood pizza peel, stainless steel pizza cutter with comfort wooden handle and blade cover, recipe ebook, and dough tool scraper. Essential tools for both beginners and experienced pizza makers

name: 18 Inch Pizza Stone, Round Pizza Stone for oven - Durable Ceramic Pizza Grill Stone, Heat Resistant up to 1,472°F, Perfect for Homemade Pizza, Bread and More (17.8 inches)
short_description: 17.8 Inch Round Pizza Stone: This extra-large, 17.8 inch pizza stone is perfect for baking big pizzas or multiple items at once, making it a great choice for pizza parties and family gatherings. Suitable for oven and grill No odors: Built to last with high-quality ceramic, this large pizza stone is heat-resistant up to 1,472°F (800°C). To prevent odors during cooking, always keep the pizza stone clean after each use and avoid using ingredients containing fats and oils. Quick & Even Heat Distribution: The thick pizza stone for grill evenly distributes heat, creating a perfectly crisp, light crust on pizzas, bread, cookies, and more. Unlike other materials, cordierite excels in heat retention and durability, resisting cracks even at high temperatures. Easy to Clean & Maintain: Simply hand wash the cooled stone with warm water. [Warning] Never use soap or detergent to clean the stone! Never season cordierite pizza stone with oil or grease! About us: Colenza is a women-owned company that stands by our quality. Every unit of our product is thoroughly inspected by both human and machine to ensure the best quality for you. We offer 6-month warranty for normal wear and tear. Please reach out to us for any issue and we will make it right!

name: OVENTE 13" Round Pizza Stone for Oven and Grill, Heat Resistant Ceramic Flat Baking Stone with Cutter Wheel, Metal Rack Stand, Ideal for Making Crisp Crust Pizza, Bread, Cookies & More, Beige BW10132
short_description: GET A BITE OF THOSE CRISPY CRUSTS – Achieve perfectly browned, evenly cooked dough every time. This bakeware features thousands of micro-holes that absorb excess moisture, ensuring a crispy exterior while keeping the inside soft and moist. Whether you're baking bread, pizza, or pastries, this innovative design helps you get that golden, crunchy perfection every time. SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION FOR BAKING – This pizza stone heats up quickly and evenly. Engineered for exceptional heat retention, it maintains consistent temperatures while baking, delivering restaurant-quality results in your home kitchen. Built to withstand extreme thermal shocks, this durable stone won’t crack or lose performance, even with daily exposure to high heat. JUST THE RIGHT SIZE – At 13 inches, this pizza stone is easier to handle than larger options, making it simple to move from the oven to the countertop. Plus, the included metal rack doubles as a handle and pizza stand, adding convenience to your baking experience. Perfect for baking pizza, bread and other delicious treats, offering maximum functionality without the bulk. LOW MAINTENANCE & EASY TO USE – Unlike other pizza stones that require conditioning or seasoning, this one is hassle-free. Simply preheat the oven, place your pizza on the stone and enjoy perfectly baked results. After use, just let it cool down and rinse with warm water, no special care needed. US-BASED CUSTOMER SERVICE LETS YOU BUY WITH CONFIDENCE – OVENTE warranties that the product shall be free from defects in material and workmanship under normal use and conditions, for 1 year from the original purchase date.
product_description: Skip the takeout and make authentic, brick oven-style pizza in your own kitchen with the OVENTE Ceramic Pizza Stone BW10132! All you need is quality dough, cheese, and your favorite toppings to create a mouthwatering homemade masterpiece. A great pizza starts with a perfectly baked crust—whether it’s a crispy, meat-loaded pie or a simple flatbread topped with cheese and tomatoes. This 13-inch pizza stone, crafted from porous ceramic, ensures superior heat absorption for even cooking and a crisp, golden crust. Includes a pizza cutter wheel for effortless slicing, while the sturdy metal handles double as a stand rack for easy oven-to-table transfer. Compatible with both conventional and microwave ovens for versatile baking—perfect for baking bread, biscuits, tortillas, bagels, cookies, rolls, and more. Additionally, it can also be use for heating and reheating pizzas and other baked goods. With the OVENTE Ceramic Pizza Stone BW10132, enjoy crispy, fresh, and delicious homemade pizza anytime!
